address: An Phu Dong, District 12, Ho Chi Minh City

experience.title: ANIMAL IMAGE CLASSIFICATION USING CNN
experience.description: Built an image classification system for animals using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN). Collected 26,200 images from Kaggle, performed preprocessing, and divided the dataset. Built and trained a CNN model from scratch using TensorFlow. Evaluated the model, visualized the training process, and developed a user-friendly interface. Achieved 92.41% accuracy on the test set.

experience.title: LUNG CANCER PATIENT RECORDS MANAGEMENT USING HADOOP & SPARK
experience.role: Data processing and analysis using Spark, storing on HDFS
experience.description: Built a lung cancer patient management system. Collected dataset from Kaggle and performed data cleaning/preprocessing using Pandas. Stored data using Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS). Built and trained a Random Forest model to predict disease risk. Used Spark to count common disease characteristics by age. Deployed a web app interface using Flask to display analysis results and support CSV uploads.
